properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Crockett, TN; Dyer, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 17 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the S.F. of the Forked Deer River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the S.F. of the Forked Deer River near Halls
* until further notice.
* At 06 PM Friday the stage was 9.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 10.5 feet on Sunday January 19.
* Flood stage is 9.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Saturday January 11 and will
continue rising to near 10.5 feet by  Sunday January 19 then begin
falling.
* At 10.5 feet...Flooding on agriculture land near the river.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Saturday morning or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
